sentences.en: ...the venturesome graduate who is determined to succeed.
sentences.cn: ...敢闯敢干、下决心要成功的毕业生。

sentences.en: A trip to the moon is a venturesome journey.
sentences.cn: 前往月球旅行是冒险的.

sentences.en: Bertha slipped out of the side - door with a delightful feeling of doing something venturesome.
sentences.cn: 伯莎以一种干冒险勾当的愉快心情从侧门溜了出去.

sentences.en: Bungee jumping is a sort of venturesome sports.
sentences.cn: 高空跳伞是一项冒险的运动.

sentences.en: He is talented, and venturesome, and resolute.
sentences.cn: 他有才能, 有闯劲, 有决心.

sentences.en: Then too , some of the girls in the typing pool can be quite venturesome.
sentences.cn: 想想看他们接触的这麽密切,他教她们计算机, 她们告诉他自己的一切.

words.tran_cn: 不顾一切的；好冒险的；大胆的
冒险的；危险的；好冒险的

trans.tran_cn: （人）好冒险的，胆大的，（行动）有危险的，冒险（性）的
